name: Geometry Clash (Ludorem Studios)
description:
Geometry Clash is a fast-paced top-down shooter with random events throughout the game.  Play as a triangle and destroy as many squares as you can. They will target you as well as each other. As you play, 20 different random events will happen like buffs and debuffs, or even changing the size of your bullets! The controls are in the tutorial section of the menu (janky controller support included, keyboard+mouse recommended!). Have fun! 

NOTE: TO ACCESS THE LEADERBOARD YOU NEED TO DOWNLOAD THE GAME, IT DOES NOT WORK IN THE BROWSER!

Made in less than 6 days for Xanderjam 6!
